About This Highland Home

Welcome to your fully renovated dream home in Highland! This stunning 4-bedroom, 3-bath residence offers approximately 2,304 sq. ft. of stylish living space, set on a generous 10,950 sq. ft. lot. Thoughtfully remodeled from top to bottom, every detail has been designed with comfort and elegance in mind.

Step inside to discover brand-new luxury vinyl plank flooring, fresh interior paint, and beautifully updated bathrooms featuring sleek tile work and modern fixtures. The inviting floor plan boasts both a formal living room and dining room—perfect for entertaining—as well as a convenient downstairs bedroom and full bath, ideal for guests or multi-generational living.

The chef's kitchen is a showstopper, showcasing all-new cabinetry, quartz countertops, and stainless-steel appliances. A spacious family room with a cozy fireplace flows effortlessly into the dining area and out to the expansive backyard, where mountain views and ample space await for entertaining, gardening, or even adding a pool.

Upstairs, retreat to your private primary suite complete with a walk-in closet, spa-inspired bath, and a balcony offering breathtaking views—a perfect spot to enjoy your morning coffee or sunset unwind.

Additional Highlights:

  • Attached two-car garage
  • Central heating and air conditioning
  • A highly functional, desirable floor plan

All of this is nestled in a peaceful neighborhood with easy access to shopping, dining, parks, and freeways. Move-in ready and beautifully designed, this Highland gem combines style, comfort, and convenience in one incredible package.
